Cursos Disponíveis
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Course } from '../model/course'; import { CoursesService } from '../services/courses.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent implements OnInit { courses: Observable; displayedColumns = ['name', 'category']; //coursesService: CoursesService; constructor(private coursesService: CoursesService ) { //this.courses = []; //this.coursesService = new CoursesService(); this.courses = this.coursesService.list(); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
